trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> property to determine which row changed.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> property to determine which row state changed.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.

This constructor uses the parameter values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> properties.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that has a changed state.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that has a changed state.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that has a changed state.
Gets the state that has changed on the row.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
